value.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

value.title: Integrate data with Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Pipeline
value.excerpt: Integrate data with Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Pipeline

value.title: Secure your identities by using Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Use Azure Active Directory to you secure your internal, external, and customer identities.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure Kubernetes open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

value.title: Keep your virtual machines updated
value.excerpt: Learn to use Azure Update Management to update virtual machines, verify agent connectivity, and use Azure Log Analytics in your cloud environment.

value.title: Load balance your web service traffic with Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Improve application resilience by distributing load across multiple servers and use path-based routing to direct web traffic.

value.title: Fundamentals of computer networking
value.excerpt: You'll learn the fundamental principles of computer networking to prepare you for the Azure admin and developer learning paths.

value.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
value.excerpt: Use neural network models to make predictions. Change neural network structures to refine predictions using TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks

value.title: Principles of cloud computing and deployment
value.excerpt: Principles of cloud computing and deployment

value.title: Secure Azure Active Directory users with Multi-Factor Authentication
value.excerpt: Learn how to use multi-factor authentication with Azure AD to harden your user accounts.

value.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
value.excerpt: Find out how Azure network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

value.title: Secure your application by using OpenID Connect and Azure AD
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to enable users to authenticate in multiple systems by using their Azure AD identities.

value.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Protect your servers and VMs from brute-force and malware attacks with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: Stop hackers from getting into your Windows and Linux servers. In this module, you’ll discover how to protect VMs and servers with Azure Security Center

value.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
value.excerpt: Explore the options for Azure disk encryption to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new virtual machines.

value.title: Monitor and troubleshoot your end-to-end Azure network infrastructure by using network monitoring tools
value.excerpt: Learn how to investigate and diagnose problems in your Azure virtual networks by using Network Watcher and other tools.

value.title: An introduction to decentralized identities | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Danny Strockis joins Scott Hanselman to discuss decentralized identity, which gives users ownership of their digital identities and data by leveraging permissionless distributed ledgers.  04:07 - Authentication concept 10:30 - Demo  Decentralized identity – Own your own identity https://aka.ms/azfr/566/01

value.title: An overview of Azure Blueprints | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Alex Frankel (@sonofdiesel) joins Scott Hanselman (@shanselman) to discuss Azure Blueprints. Environment creation can be a long and error prone process. Azure Blueprints helps you deploy and update cloud environments in a repeatable manner using composable artifacts such as policies, role-based access

value.title: Cognitive Search - Azure Search with AI | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jacob Jedryszek joins Scott Hanselman to talk about about using Cognitive Services with Azure Search with your mobile and web apps. Skip hiring search experts who know what an inverted index is. Don't worry about distributed systems expertise to scale your service to handle large amount of data. And
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6kw8SHwxp9c" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Full-stack end-to-end monitoring with Azure Monitor | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Rahul Bagaria joins Lara Rubbelke to discuss Azure Monitor, which now includes Log Analytics and Application Insights. Azure Monitor provides full stack monitoring tools for collecting and analyzing telemetry that allow you to maximize the performance and availability of your cloud and on-premises resources

value.title: Go serverless: Event-driven applications with Azure Functions | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jeff Hollan joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can quickly develop and deploy code to run in the cloud with Azure Functions. Functions can be written in a variety of languages, and will automatically trigger and scale based on your application needs.  1:53 - Demo  Quickstart: Create your first function

value.title: How to connect and deliver services privately on Azure with Azure Private Link | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Narayan Anamalai joins Donovan Brown to introduce Azure Private Link. In this episode, Narayan demonstrates how you can secure Azure PaaS resources and your Azure network using Private Link, and provide protection against data exfiltration.  8:45 - Demo  Azure Private Link overview https://aka.ms/azfr/610/01

value.title: How to troubleshoot common virtual machine issues | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to troubleshoot common virtual machine issues using the diagnose and solve experience of the Azure Portal.    Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com  Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal

value.title: How to use Azure Automation with PowerShell | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure Automation with a Windows Machine with PowerShell. Azure Automation makes it easy to do common tasks like, scaling Azure SQL Database up and down and starting and stopping a virtual machine.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips

value.title: How to use Azure Bastion to connect securely to your Azure VMs | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Using a bastion host can help limit threats such as port scanning and other types of malware targeting your VMs. Ashish Jain joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Bastion gives you secure and seamless RDP and SSH access to your virtual machines.
